Module it.polimi.ingsw.am01
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am01.model.chat

Class ChatManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am01.model.chat.ChatManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventEmitter<ChatEvent>
public class ChatManager extends Object implements EventEmitter<ChatEvent>
The handler of the chat, allowing to send a message and view the MailBox of a specific PlayerProfile

  • Nested Class Summary

    • getMailbox

      public List<Message> getMailbox(PlayerProfile pp)
      Parameters:
      pp - The PlayerProfile for which to return the mailbox
      Returns:
      An ordered List of messages sent by PlayerProfile and received by PlayerProfile. Message order is based on timestamps
